answers.answer: Yeah definitely don't stress if your high risk your partner should understand and not be trying to stress you out the baby is more important but I spotted at the beginning my baby is fine now that was in my first trimester I'm going into my 3ed now light pink is not bad but sence your high risk I would check with my ob

That happened to me and lasted a few days, I talked it over with some and Google'd it before I started stressing. All it said was that it could be old blood coming out and that it's pretty common. As long as it isn't bright red and soaking the pad, you should be fine but I do agree with momy2be since you are high risk, I would still call you doctor.
Thank you ladies, I fell up the stairs not long ago too :( I'm off to the Hospital for a check up for the Hugh blood pressure so I'll defiantly be mentioning all this.

question: Hi ladies,So lately I have had a rough time in my relationship and I'm not sure if this might be the cause. I am a high risk patient for preeclampsia so I get high blood pressure very easy over stressful things. It's easy said "relax and rest" but I have never been that type to just relax and rest. Yesterday morning I had a little bit of pinky discharge on my underwear liner and I only notice it when I wipe. I am on my last med for thrush as well and not sure if that might be why this pinky discharge is there? Sorry if TMI but please what should I do??
title: Help?? Very light pink discharge/blood?
